snippet: John Tomic, the coach of the Australian tennis star Bernard Tomic, faces assault charges in Spain after a fight with his son’s hitting partner.
abstract: John Tomic, father and coach of Australian tennis player Bernard Tomic, will not receive an event credential at 2013 French Open after getting into a fight with his son's hitting partner Thomas Drouet; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: John Tomic, the coach of the Australian tennis star Bernard Tomic, faces assault charges in Spain after a fight with his son’s hitting partner.

headline.seo: French Open Will Bar Bernard Tomic’s Father
headline.main: French Open Will Bar Tomic’s Father
